title: PICS: Bontle Modiselle and Priddy Ugly go topless for gorgeous pregnancy photo shoot
text:
PICS: Bontle Modiselle and Priddy Ugly go topless for gorgeous pregnancy photo shoot share this

Johannesburg – Bontle Modiselle and Priddy Ugly are topless and shimmering in gold dust in a stunning photoshoot they did for Mamas & Papas magazine.

The couple, who recently tied the knot in a beautiful ceremony, announced in June that they are expecting their first child together.

Sharing pictures from their Mamas & Papas cover, Bontle wrote: "One of my greatest dreams has always been to carry your seed @priddy_ugly".

TAKE A LOOK AT THE BEAUTIFUL PHOTOS HERE:
description: Bontle Modiselle and Priddy Ugly are topless and shimmering in gold dust in a stunning photoshoot they did for Mamas & Papas magazine.
